00324 OldItemNames::getNbrStrings() const {

00333 inline char*
00334 OldItemNames::getString(uint32 stringID) {
00335    if (stringID >= getNbrStrings())
00336       return (NULL);
00337    else
00338       return ((char*) stringTable.getElementAt(stringID));
00339 }

00355 inline uint32 
00356 OldItemNames::getNbrBlocks() const 
00357 {
00358    return getNbrStrings() - nbrBlockedStrings + 1;

00360 
00361 inline uint32 
00362 OldItemNames::getBlockSize(uint32 blockNbr) const 
00363 {
00364    if (blockNbr == 0)
00365       return sizeOfBlock;
00366    else
00367       return strlen( (char*) stringTable.
00368                      getElementAt(blockNbr+nbrBlockedStrings-1));
00369 }
00370 
00371 inline char* 
00372 OldItemNames::getBlockStart(uint32 blockNbr) const 
00373 {
00374    if (blockNbr == 0)
00375       return theStrings;
00376    else
00377       return (char*) stringTable.
00378                getElementAt(blockNbr+nbrBlockedStrings-1);
00379 }
